outputs.output_descr: Capacity Building for Strengthening Diaspora Resource Mobilisation and Utilisation project implemented by Ministry of foreign Affairs (IP); Uganda Investment Authority and Bank of Uganda (RPs). The project duration is 2011-2013. Specifically, this aims at creating an enabling environment that fosters the diaspora contributions and thereby lead to growth and socio-economic transformation for prosperity, which is a key goal of the National Development Plan (NDP). The project will focus on interventions in three areas: i) strengthening the MoFA information and management systems for greater coordination and strategic partnerships with the diaspora; ii) developing policy and institutional arrangements for guiding diaspora participation and contribution to national development and iii) enhancing incentives for diaspora investments and remittances as well as identifying opportunities for national development so as to guide diaspora investment.

project_descr: Capacity Building for Strengthening Diaspora Resource Mobilisation and Utilisation-Ministry of Foreign Affairs (IP)- RPs Uganda Investment Authority and Bank of Uganda
